document.full_text: security forces have moved into central syria and coastal areas ahead of friday prayers in a test of will for demonstrators determined to maintain protests against the rule of president bashar al-assad.
document.title: assad deploys his troops before friday prayers
lines_and_colors: security forces have moved into central syria and coastal areas ahead of friday prayers in a test of will for demonstrators determined to maintain protests against the rule of president bashar al-assad.
